books.author: by James Patterson and Mark Sullivan
books.description: Jack Morgan and Justine Smith search for a high-powered celebrity couple who have disappeared.
books.name: PRIVATE L.A.

books.author: by Jonathan Kellerman
books.description: The psychologist and police consultant Alex Delaware becomes embroiled in a child custody dispute that escalates into murder.
books.name: KILLER

books.author: by Donna Tartt
books.description: A painting smuggled out of the Metropolitan Museum of Art after a bombing becomes a boy’s prize, guilt and burden.
books.name: THE GOLDFINCH

books.author: by Sue Monk Kidd
books.description: The relationship between a wealthy Charleston girl, Sarah Grimké, who will grow up to become a prominent abolitionist, and the slave she is given for her 11th birthday.
books.name: THE INVENTION OF WINGS

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A sequel, about race and inheritance, to “A Time to Kill.”
books.name: SYCAMORE ROW

books.author: by Jo Nesbo
books.description: Inspector Harry Hole is dispatched from Oslo when the Norwegian ambassador to Thailand is found dead in a Bangkok brothel. The second Harry Hole novel, recently translated into English.
books.name: COCKROACHES

books.author: by Christina Baker Kline
books.description: A historical novel about orphans swept off the streets of New York and sent to the Midwest in the 1920s.
books.name: ORPHAN TRAIN

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by Anna Quindlen
books.description: An aging photographer rents a rural cottage and discovers sparks of creativity and desire.
books.name: STILL LIFE WITH BREAD CRUMBS

books.author: by Mark Helprin
books.description: Heroic lives in Manhattan between the late 19th century and the year 2000. Originally published in 1983.
books.name: WINTER'S TALE

books.author: by Alex Berenson
books.description: John Wells is sent on a mission to find the truth about a mysterious Iranian package said to be bound for the United States.
books.name: THE COUNTERFEIT AGENT

books.author: by Tara Conklin
books.description: Conklin weaves together the stories of two remarkable heroines: a runaway slave in the pre-Civil War South and a lawyer in modern-day New York working on a historic class-action lawsuit.
books.name: THE HOUSE GIRL

books.author: by K.M. Scott
books.description: The third book in the Heart of Stone series continues the story of Tristan and Nina.
books.name: GIVE IN TO ME

books.author: by J. S. Cooper and Helen Cooper
books.description: The first of three erotic novellas about Katie Raymond and the compelling billionaire Brandon Hastings.
books.name: THE EX GAMES

books.author: by Graeme Simsion
books.description: A man with Asperger's syndrome becomes involved with an unconventional woman.
books.name: THE ROSIE PROJECT
